translations: n.（Bur）人名；（西、俄、匈）布尔；（法）比尔

sentences.sentence: Other trees include the bur oak.
North American bur marigold with large flowers.
sentences.translation: 北美的一种鬼针草属植物，花大。

sentences.sentence: I think he loved me, bur he was very young, and he was often ill.
sentences.translation: 我想他是爱我的，但是他太年轻了，还经常生病。
